column5: Just bought an Ice 55.  Awesome features!  I've never used electronics on the ice but it's gonna get a work out this week end.  Let U know how I make out with it.  I was able to go online & download the user's manual before actually purchasing it.  This was a bonus in making a decision which one to buy.
Sounds good.......what does that use for a power source ? ? ?
7ah 12V gel battery the same kind as Vexilar and Marcum.  Good choice on the Ice 55, I'm sure you will love it!!! I have a Marcum LX-5 and couldn't fish without it now.

THANKS........then I should  be good to go with this from Cabela's....12V  8ah...  http://www.cabelas.com/product/Cabelas-Rechargeable-12-Volt-Battery/700551.uts?Ntk=AllProducts&searchPath=%2Fcatalog%2Fsearch%2F%3FN%3D1000002949%26Ne%3D1000002949%26Ntk%3DAllProducts%26Ntt%3Dbatteries%26Ntx%3Dmode%252Bmatchallpartial%26WTz_l%3DHeader%253BSearch-All%2BProducts%26WTz_st%3DSearchRefinements%26form_state%3DsearchForm%26search%3Dbatteries%26searchTypeByFilter%3DAllProducts%26x%3D18%26y%3D1&Ntt=batteries&WTz_l=Header%3BSearch-All+Products
Thanx for the positive comments.  I hope I made the right choice.  Now all I need is fish!
Used it today for the first time, love it!!!! Very user friendly for us older folks who didn't grow up in the computer/electronics age.  I had a blast on Nipissing today.
Nah  The fish weren't cooperating for me, but another person did very well, not too far from where I was NO FISHING!!  HA HA!
